title: createorupdateasuperadminuser
description: Test the API endpoint POST /api/super-admin/create-temp-super-admin to verify that it correctly creates or updates a super admin user when provided with valid email and password. Validate success response and error handling for server errors.

title: fetchusercreditbalance
description: Test the API endpoint GET /api/super-admin/users/{userId}/credits to ensure it returns the correct current credit balance for a valid userId. Verify proper error responses for invalid userId or when no credit record exists.

title: addcreditstouseraccount
description: Test the API endpoint POST /api/super-admin/users/{userId}/credits to verify that credits can be added to a user's account with a valid amount and optional reason. Confirm the new balance is updated correctly and server errors are handled gracefully.
